Data Export and Archiving

export_processed_data.Rd

Export processed data and metadata in various formats.

Usage

export_processed_data(
  data,
  metadata = NULL,
  output_dir = "exports",
  formats = c("csv", "rds"),
  include_metadata = TRUE,
  compression = TRUE,
  ...
)

Arguments

data

Processed data object

metadata

Metadata object

output_dir

Output directory (default: "exports")

formats

Vector of export formats ("csv", "rds", "json", "mat")

include_metadata

Whether to include metadata in export (default: TRUE)

compression

Whether to compress files (default: TRUE)

...

Additional arguments

Value

List of exported file paths
